snippet: Net income rose to $332 million, or 75 cents a share, in the second quarter, from $303 million, or 64 cents a share, a year ago.
abstract: Gap Inc reports second-quarter net income of $332 million, or 75 cents a share, up from $303 million, or 64 cents a share, one year earlier; profits and sales beat analyst expectation, and company raises its full-year profit forecast.
lead_paragraph: Net income rose to $332 million, or 75 cents a share, in the second quarter, from $303 million, or 64 cents a share, a year ago.

headline.main: Strong Sales at Old Navy Lead Gap to Raise Forecast
headline.print_headline: Strong Sales at Old Navy Lead Gap to Raise Forecast
